loggedout.explainer: Steeminvite je usluga koja vam omogućava da pozovete svoje prijatelje na steem.

index.tokenexplain: Da biste napravili steem nalog, morate prvo da zahtevate token. Oni se mogu dobiti uništavanjem određene količine STEEM-a, ili trošenjem velike količine RC mane. Zauzvrat, novi nalog prima minimalnu količinu RC mane potrebnu za obavljanje transakcija na blokčejnu bez posedovanja Steem Power-a.
index.tokencost: Trenutna cena zahteva iznosi 0STEEM-a ili 0 RC mane
index.pendingclaims: Zahtevali ste nalog.
index.nopendingclaims: Još uvek niste zahtevali nijedan nalog.
index.invitespending: Jedna pozivnica je na čekanju,
index.invitespending_plural: 0 pozivnica je na čekanju,
index.noinvitespending: Nemate pozivnica na čekanju,
index.invitemore: tako da sada možete pozvati prijatelja!
index.invitemore_plural: tako da možete pozvati još 0 prijatelja.
index.abletoclaim:
Vaša maksimalna RC mana iznosi 0,
Trenutno imate 0%,
index.canclaim: što vam omogućava da zahtevate jedan nalog kada imate 100%
index.canclaim_plural: što vam omogućava da zahtevate 0 naloga kada imate 100%
index.cannotclaim: što Vam ne dozvoljava da zahtevate nalog. Dodajte još Steem Power-a!
index.canclaimnow: tako da možete odmah zahtevati nalog.
index.canclaimnow_plural: tako da možete odmah zahtevati 0 naloga.
index.cannotclaimnow: tako da morate sačekati dok ne budete u mogućnosti da zahtevate diskontovani nalog.
index.abletobuy: Sa vašim saldom od 0 STEEM možete
index.canbuy: teoretski da zahtevate još jedan nalog.
index.canbuy_plural: teoretski da zahtevate još 0 naloga.
index.cannotbuy: ne možete da zahtevate više naloga. Nabavite još STEEM-a!

freeclaimmodal.title: Zahtevajte diskontovane steem naloge
freeclaimmodal.explainer:
Poslednja cena za zahtev diskontovanog naloga bila je 0 RC
Imajte na umu da cena varira sve vreme. Kada se zahteva više naloga u kratkom vremenskom periodu, cena raste.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount: Sa 0 RC možete zahtevati jedan nalog.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount_plural: Sa 0 RC možete zahtevati 0 naloga.
freeclaimmodal.moreexplain: Možete zahtevati jedan nalog, ili koristiti bota za zahtevanje dok ne potrošite RC ili ga zaustavite.

botclaimmodal.title: Automatizovano zahtevanje diskontovanih steem naloga
botclaimmodal.explainer: Zdravo! Ja sam prijateljski robot za zahteve. Kliknite na dugme ispod kako bih započeo svoj posao. Zahtevaću naloge sve dok ne ostanete bez RC, ili mi ne zadate komandu da se zaustavim pritiskom na drugo dugme.
botclaimmodal.working: Radim! Do sada je zahtevano 0 naloga.
botclaimmodal.stopped:
Zaustavljeno nakon zahtevanja 0 naloga.
Poruka o grešci:

paidclaimmodal.title: Platite zahtev steem naloga
paidclaimmodal.explainer:
Cena zahteva naloga je 0 STEEM-a
Ovu cenu određuju vitnesi (witness).
Novi nalog će primiti osnovnu količinu RC kao da ima istu količinu Steem Power-a.

invitemodal.title: Pozovite na Steem!
invitemodal.label: Oznaka
invitemodal.by_email: Isključite ovo da dobijete jedan ili više linkova direktno, umesto slanja email-a
invitemodal.mailtext:
Zdravo,

Pozvani ste od strane {} da se pridružite Steem blokčejnu.

Šta je to?

Steem je backend koji koriste novi društveni mediji kao što su steemit.com i busy.org. Koristeći blokčejn tehnologiju, postoji novi način kako da plate svojim korisnicima za njihove aktivnosti.

Prihvatite pozivnicu klikom na sledeći link:
invitemodal.multi: Kreirajte link koji važi za višestruko pravljenje naloga
invitemodal.multi_label: Amount of accounts this link is valid for (take care, you may run out of claims using this option!)
invitemodal.delegate: A new account only has a basic amount of RC to transact on the blockchain. If you want the new user to be able to do more, delegate some Steem Power. You can also do that later of course.
invitemodal.delegate_amount: Amount of Steem Power to delegate
invitemodal.validity: How many days should the invite be valid before being automatically deleted?

keys.active_required: This action requires your active key.

step1.lead: Hi! You are only a few steps away from getting your own Steem account!
step1.text:
Your account will include your personal wallet, so security is extremely important.
We have generated a master password for your account, which you need to keep in a safe location. Write it down somewhere!
step1.submit: I have written down the password and will never ever lose it

step2.lead: Okay. Make sure to not lose the password! There is no way to recover it!
step2.text: Your Steem username has to be at least three characters long, and can not contain other characters than lowercase letters, numbers and a dash. It has to be unique and can never be changed. Choose it carefully.

step3.text:
What we said about your password before was not a joke.
To verify you have not made a mistake while noting your password, please enter it here.
If you cannot proceed, reload the page in your browser and start over.

step4.text:
There are different access levels for a Steem account.
The posting key is used for everyday social media activity, i.e. it lets you post and vote.
To access your wallet and move STEEM, you need the active key.
The owner key can be used to change those two, and should never be used for other purposes. It's best kept besides the master password, don't use it online.
Last and least there's the memo key, which has no function yet but may in the future be used to decrypt your private data like direct messages.
step4.warning:
These keys are generated from your password. They can be used instead of it, but only for their specific purpose.
It's safer to use the posting key if you want to use a device to only post and vote, or the active key when you want to perform other actions.
THE PASSWORD AND THE OWNER KEY ARE BEST TO KEPT OFFLINE!
step4.confirm: By clicking the following button, the user who created your invitation will be informed, and hopefully create your account soon.
step4.finish: Finish account request and leave this site
